participant_1.background:
I don't want to follow in my dad's footsteps and inherit his appliance store.
I watch YouTube videos about welding to learn new things and keep my mind off my best friend who just moved away.
I am known for my dedication and work ethic.
Music is not my thing.
My parents were born in Europe, but I was born in the United States.

participant_2.background:

i can tell right away if i m going to like someone.
I ride my bicycle to work.
my bestfriend is from out of town.
pudding makes me gassy.

content.text: Pretty good! I'm just watching YouTube videos about welding. What are you up to?
I'm biking to work. It's a beautiful day outside!
I wish I could bike to work. It's too far for me.
What do you do for work?
I work at an appliance store. It's not my dream job, but it's a good paying job.
Ah, that's cool. I'm a software engineer.
That sounds really cool! Do you enjoy it?
I love it! It's a lot of fun, and I get to work on really interesting projects.
That's great! I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks! What's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I like to watch YouTube videos, go out with my friends, and play video games.
What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of games, but I'm really into open world games right now.
Oh, me too! I love exploring new worlds and meeting new characters.
Me too! It's so much fun to get lost in a game.
I know, right? It's like you're in a whole new world.
